content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: VISITNUM
      operator: non_empty
    - domain: is_not_contained_by
      name: VISTNUM
      operator: get_dataset
      value:
        Target: VISITNUM
        comparator: $tv_visitnum
    - domain: not_equal_to
      operator: get_dataset
      value:
        Target: SVUPRES
        comparator: $tv_svupres
CoreId: CORE-CG0033 - duplicate do not use
Description: Verify that visitnum is planned and exists in TV
Operations:
  - domain: TV
    id: $tv_visitnum
    name: VISITNUM
    operator: distinct
  - domain: SV
    id: $sv_svpressp = 'Y'
    name: VISITNUM
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: Planned Visit Value cannot be found Trial Visit (TV) domain
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Version: '1'
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0033
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and
                  VISITDY must be those defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section
                  7.3.1, Trial Visits).
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item:
                Section: 4.4.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
Core:
  Status: Draft

json.Description: Verify that visitnum is planned and exists in TV

Outcome.Message: Planned Visit Value cannot be found Trial Visit (TV) domain

Citations.Cited_Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and VISITDY must be those defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section 7.3.1, Trial Visits).
